Question: Having only reported for work on twelve occasions out of a total of 35 days of production, this person was dismissed.
Hints: In February 1961, this person was admitted to the Payne Whitney Psychiatric Clinic.
This person was invited to spend the weekend with Lyon and his wife Bebe Daniels at their home.
The press speculated about the identity of the anonymous model and commented that she closely resembled this person.
